env.info: (plate 0) (at 0 2) (sort 1 desk) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 refrigerator) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (type 2 container) (opened 2) (sort 3 cupboard) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (type 3 container) (opened 3) (sort 4 microwave) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (type 4 container) (closed 4) (sort 5 cup) (size 5 small) (color 5 red) (sort 6 cup) (size 6 small) (color 6 black) (sort 7 remotecontrol) (size 7 small) (color 7 white) (sort 8 can) (size 8 small) (color 8 green) (hold 8) (sort 9 can) (size 9 small) (color 9 yellow) (sort 10 book) (size 10 small)

test.instr: (:ins (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X black) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X yellow) (sort Y cupboard))) (:cons_not (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y refrigerator)))) (:cons_not (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y cupboard)))))
test.nl: The black cup is inside the refrigerator. Open the microwave oven. Take the red cup out of the microwave oven. Then take out the book and the yellow can from the cupboard. The green can cannot be inside the refrigerator or in the cupboard.
